mapper.select: SELECT partners_id, partners_name, partners_desc, partners_major, partners_specialty, partners_range, partners_img FROM tbl_partners
SELECT partners_id, partners_name, partners_desc, partners_major, partners_specialty, partners_range, partners_img FROM tbl_partners WHERE partners_id=#{partnerId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_partners (partners_id, partners_name, partners_desc, partners_major, partners_specialty, partners_range, partners_img) VALUES (#{partnerId},#{partnerName},#{partnerDesc}, #{partnerMajor},#{partnerSpecialty},#{partnerRange}, #{partnerImg})
